title: Clock Tower 3D Watch Face
summary: Got an Android 5.0 watch?  Fortify it with gears and glass!
description: Why settle for just hands that move?  View a fully 3D clock tower interior instead!This OpenGL rendered watch face features moving gears, bats, light streaming through glass, moving steam, and more!  Go to the settings screen to adjust the look of the clock face and the hands it uses, and go beyond a simple 2D image!  Scene lighting can even change based on the time of day.Or, if you'd prefer a more traditional feel, you can choose from a selection of modern and abstract watch faces to overlay, picking the style of timekeeping that appeals to you.  Choose your favorite typeface.  Enable display of features such as a compass, moon phase, battery remaining, and current date.  Show only the features you need.NOTE: Our watch faces require Android 5.0 on your Wear device.  They fully respect sleep mode, and will fade in the moving background when you wake the device.  Both round and square faces are fully supported.Check your Android Wear app to set!We don't yet have a video for this product, but you can check out the behavior of the live wallpaper version here : https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=fishnoodle.clock
descriptionHTML:
Why settle for just hands that move? View a fully 3D clock tower interior instead!

This OpenGL rendered watch face features moving gears, bats, light streaming through glass, moving steam, and more! Go to the settings screen to adjust the look of the clock face and the hands it uses, and go beyond a simple 2D image! Scene lighting can even change based on the time of day.

Or, if you'd prefer a more traditional feel, you can choose from a selection of modern and abstract watch faces to overlay, picking the style of timekeeping that appeals to you. Choose your favorite typeface. Enable display of features such as a compass, moon phase, battery remaining, and current date. Show only the features you need.

NOTE: Our watch faces require Android 5.0 on your Wear device. They fully respect sleep mode, and will fade in the moving background when you wake the device. Both round and square faces are fully supported.

Check your Android Wear app to set!

We don't yet have a video for this product, but you can check out the behavior of the live wallpaper version here : https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=fishnoodle.clock
comments: Doesn't work on my Letv x501 My smartphone have android 5.0.2 but when I download the theme I cannot find it in the system wallpaper to apply as a live wallpaper. I also download the theme in my Samsung Galaxy S3 mini that have android 4.1.2 and for my old Samsung worked. I find it instantly in menu.

The settings besides color don't work for my moto 360, andthe top of the screen is cut off, so there's the flat tire on the bottom (due to the watch) and one on the top that shouldn't be there because there's functional screen space
Love this one! The bats make my day!
Beautiful! I have this on my phone background and am so happy to see it for my watch!
I can't even find the icon It's not on widget or wallpaper FIX it
recentChanges: - Fixed 'flat tire' handling on Motorola devices
- New pref to allow full frame watch markings on flat-tire devices
- Can display mini digital time on analog faces
- Watch faces resize to get out of the way of notifications
